Class simplePtx.cam

  • java.lang.Object
    • simplePtx.cam
  • Enclosing class:
    simplePtx

    public class simplePtx.cam
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aims at easing the process of capturing image from the camera in processing, both in its setup and in its usage. On top of that, the class hosts all usefull version of captured image (whole, croped, filtered and final result)

    • Method Summary

      boolean update()
      Get another image from the camera stream if possible
      void updateImg()

    • Method Detail

      • startFromId

        public void startFromId(int _idCam,
                        PApplet _myGrandParent)
        Functions that let the user select which camera to use and which mode of camera to use for the image recognision stream. It then launch it.
        Parameters:
        _idCam - the identifiant of the selected camera
        _myGrandParent - a reference to the current PApplet, necessary for instancing the Capture class

      • update

        public boolean update()
        Get another image from the camera stream if possible
        Returns:
        true if the camera is availabe.

      • updateImg

        public void updateImg()
        Copy the main image into filter Image and rez Image objects for displaying and/or futur processing.

      • isOn

        public boolean isOn()
        Function that test if the camera is availabe
        Returns:
        true if the camera is availabe.
